snippet.title: Fearbonding - A Yandere BL Horror VN - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
In #Fearbonding, our upcoming yandere BL horror VN, you play as Hinata, a demon. Sweet and viscous like honey, that’s how fear tastes to you. But true terror is hard to come by, so the day you meet Kosuke, your new goal is clear: You need to tame this terrifying man. 

Wishlist it now! https://store.steampowered.com/app/2871980/Fearbonding/

Credits: 
Video Editor - Rainnn https://vgen.co/rannnmv 
Storyboard, Art - Night Asobu
